name: 0025 - MILES
description: This collection of cards contains only 25 units, these arts tell a story in descending order in each edition. They depict the first 25 artworks of the artist MBelliva (@mbelliva), vectorial illustrator, graphic designer from Rio de Janeiro, Brazil. He started his trajectory in digital art in 2018 and crypto art in 2021. The content of this collection consists of a diversified, simple, but extremely valuable learning process, as they are the first artwork collection made by the author.
